trans-unit.source: Analyze sensor data using Hive and Hadoop | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Analyze sensor data using Hive and Hadoop | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to analyze sensor data by using the Hive Query Console with HDInsight (Hadoop), then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel with PowerView.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to analyze sensor data by using the Hive Query Console with HDInsight (Hadoop), then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel with PowerView.

trans-unit.source: Analyze sensor data using the Hive Query Console on Hadoop in HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Analyze sensor data using the Hive Query Console on Hadoop in HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Learn how to analyze sensor data by using the Hive Query Console with HDInsight (Hadoop), then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel by using Power View.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to analyze sensor data by using the Hive Query Console with HDInsight (Hadoop), then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel by using Power View.

trans-unit.source: The steps in this document only work with Windows-based HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this document only work with Windows-based HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: In this sample, you'll use Hive to process historical data produced by heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems to identify systems that are not able to reliably maintain a set temperature.
trans-unit.target: In this sample, you'll use Hive to process historical data produced by heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems to identify systems that are not able to reliably maintain a set temperature.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to:
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to:

trans-unit.source: Create HIVE tables to query data stored in comma separated value (CSV) files.
trans-unit.target: Create HIVE tables to query data stored in comma separated value (CSV) files.

trans-unit.source: Create HIVE queries to analyze the data.
trans-unit.target: Create HIVE queries to analyze the data.

trans-unit.source: Use Microsoft Excel to connect to HDInsight (using open database connectivity (ODBC) to retrieve the analyzed data.
trans-unit.target: Use Microsoft Excel to connect to HDInsight (using open database connectivity (ODBC) to retrieve the analyzed data.

trans-unit.source: Use Power View to visualize the data.
trans-unit.target: Use Power View to visualize the data.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>A diagram of the solution architecture</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>A diagram of the solution architecture</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: An HDInsight (Hadoop) cluster: See <link><linkText>Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link> for information about creating a cluster.
trans-unit.target: An HDInsight (Hadoop) cluster: See <link><linkText>Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link> for information about creating a cluster.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Excel 2013
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Excel 2013

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Excel is used for data visualization with <link><linkText>Power View</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Excel is used for data visualization with <link><linkText>Power View</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: To run the sample
trans-unit.target: To run the sample

trans-unit.source: From your web browser, navigate to the following URL. Replace with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: From your web browser, navigate to the following URL. Replace with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, authenticate by using the administrator user name and password you used when provisioning this cluster.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, authenticate by using the administrator user name and password you used when provisioning this cluster.

trans-unit.source: From the web page that opens, click the Getting Started Gallery tab, and then under the Solutions with Sample Data category, click the Sensor Data Analysis sample.
trans-unit.target: From the web page that opens, click the Getting Started Gallery tab, and then under the Solutions with Sample Data category, click the Sensor Data Analysis sample.

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions provided on the web page to finish the sample.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions provided on the web page to finish the sample.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
